interpretation:
The Full Moon Face card represents a time of illumination and heightened emotions. This card signifies that the cycle of life is reaching its peak and it is time to acknowledge and embrace this moment. It is a time to reflect on the past and to release any negative emotions that may be holding you back. The Full Moon Face card is a reminder that everything in life goes through cycles, and that it is important to embrace the changes that come with them.

This card can also represent a time of heightened creativity and intuition. Your emotions may be running high, but this is a great time to channel that energy into your creative endeavors. Use this time to tap into your intuition and trust your instincts.

In a reading, the Full Moon Face card can signify that you are in a time of great transformation and change. It is important to remain open and receptive to the changes that are coming your way. Trust that everything is happening for a reason and that you are being guided towards your highest good.
